messages.title: Four Steps to a fairer Britain
messages.content: Fairer taxes, a fair chance for every child, a fair future, and a fair deal from the politicians.

messages.title: Tim Starkey - your local candidate
messages.content: This constituency is my home. I grew up in Amersham, going to Elangeni and Challoners schools. Now I'm a lawyer, living in Chalfont St Giles with my young family. As your MP, I'd continue to live permanently in the constituency and commute.

messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: Take action to protect vital frontline NHS services, put more police on patrol, restore the pensions/earnings link, deliver fair pay for the armed services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate prioritizes protecting communities and countryside.
The candidate emphasizes the importance of keeping health services local.
The candidate commits to cutting crime.
The candidate aims to improve education.

issues.economy: Real savings have been identified to pay for it.
issues.education: A fair chance for every child. Smaller class sizes, more money into schools and abolish university tuition fees.
issues.environment: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener. Invest in public transport, renewable energy, and energy-efficient homes
issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs
issues.health: Take action to protect vital frontline NHS services.
